name: Can You Escape Devil Palace?
description:
This is the new point and click escape game. Zombies are evil creatures which feed on brains of humans for their nasty appetite. Its a drag to stop them and capturing them. One of those stinky creture has just got out of the dead and beggin to terrorise people in the city. Its your duty to get hold of that thing and to lock it back in its coffin. Its really a nasty job to do but anyway its essential for the city's welfare.

Good luck, Go Escape It.
